What do we do?


AURO IT consulting

is a network of freelance experts worldwide, specializing in digital transformation to simplify processes.

We assist large European enterprises in their digital transformation projects.

We also serve small and medium-sized businesses, organizations, and associations, offering tailor-made digital solutions. We study your project and support you in its implementation.

What sets us apart?

We are agile :

We constantly adapt to your organization, your context, your priorities, and your goals.

We are factual and practical :

La data est notre juge de paix.
Data is our benchmark. We love data, which we use to bring clarity throughout your project.

We are also intuitive :

We understand biases and cultural differences, enabling us to grasp your organization's culture or the culture of different industries quickly.

Understanding each other is already 90% of the recipe for success.
Communication is the key to a project's success.

We are authentic :

We seek your success and will always share what we believe to be the best choice.

Our expertise

Project and program management :

We have a European network of top experts in project and program management.
We handle projects ranging from the simplest MVPs over a few weeks to multi-year ERP change programs (SAP S4 HANA).
We adapt different methodologies (agile, waterfall, V-cycle, etc.) to your context.
We serve as internal IT team collaborators.
We learn from you to enrich you with our expertise and mindset.

Digital strategy :

We design new digital use cases for your industry.
We identify new opportunities to create new services for your clients, optimize processes, or understand your clients, market, and your organization better through the exploitation and refinement of your data sources.

Website creation :

Whether you need to revamp your website or create a new one, we can handle design, conception, implementation, hosting, SEO, security, and e-commerce strategy.
All your data is hosted in Europe with the highest data protection guarantee through our partnership with OVH.

App creation :

We develop custom mobile applications to boost your business or enhance your company's productivity.

Contact us
